name.en: Walking on the Beach with the Head Prefect
name.jp: Walking on the Beach with the Head Prefect

desc.en: Hina and Sensei visit the beach to go over the boot camp. However, Hina had to leave after getting a call. Sensei started to get worried when Hina didn't return, but it turns out she's at the Lost Child Center.
desc.jp: Hina and Sensei visit the beach to go over the boot camp. However, Hina had to leave after getting a call. Sensei started to get worried when Hina didn't return, but it turns out she's at the Lost Child Center.
desc.zh_cn: 为了集中训练的预先练习而与老师来到海边的{cf阳奈}。不过因为学校调用，{cf阳奈}暂时离开，过了一段时间{cf阳奈}还是没回来，老师便开始担心。但他马上接到{cf阳奈}的联系，她在走失儿童保护中心。

desc.en: Example: FEEEEVER TIME, Undefined Behavior, Goal Wo Nerae! Overall it coincides with the Uplifting genre and combat tracks.
desc.jp: Example: FEEEEVER TIME, Undefined Behavior, Goal Wo Nerae! Overall it coincides with the Uplifting genre and combat tracks.
desc.zh_cn: 举例/联想：FEEEEVER TIME、Undefined Behavior、Goal Wo Nerae!；总体上基本与Uplifting的风格和战斗曲重合。
举例/联想：Usagi Flap、第114首曲子、第159首曲子

desc.en: Example: FEEEEVER TIME, Undefined Behavior, Goal Wo Nerae! Overall it coincides with the Uplifting genre and combat tracks.
desc.jp: Example: FEEEEVER TIME, Undefined Behavior, Goal Wo Nerae! Overall it coincides with the Uplifting genre and combat tracks.
desc.zh_cn: 举例/联想：FEEEEVER TIME、Undefined Behavior、Goal Wo Nerae!；总体上基本与Uplifting的风格和战斗曲重合。

name.jp: Doing Paperwork with the Head Prefect

name.en: Doing Paperwork with the Head Prefect
name.jp: Doing Paperwork with the Head Prefect

desc.en: Sensei decides to help Hina after seeing how overwhelmed she is with Prefect Team. The two decide to go out for dinner after she completes her work.
desc.jp: Sensei decides to help Hina after seeing how overwhelmed she is with Prefect Team. The two decide to go out for dinner after she completes her work.
desc.zh_cn: {cf阳奈}即便来集中训练，{cn风纪委员会}的业务依旧没有结束，老师为了协助{cf阳奈}来到宿舍。结束了艰难的工作之后，老师与{cf阳奈}一起吃晚餐。

desc.en: The 10th track in Blue Archive, used in relationship stories majorly.
desc.jp: The 10th track in Blue Archive, used in relationship stories majorly.
desc.zh_cn: 蔚蓝档案OST中的第十首曲子，主要用于羁绊故事中。

desc.en: In Kivotos, no future is dark; even so, it was temporary, as it will point to the bright ending that is possible to reach. Example: Connected Sky, Does the color of the sky mean anything special to you?
desc.jp: In Kivotos, no future is dark; even so, it was temporary, as it will point to the bright ending that is possible to reach. Example: Connected Sky, Does the color of the sky mean anything special to you?
desc.zh_cn: 在基沃托斯，没有任何一个未来是黑暗的；即使有，那也只是暂时的，因为最终这一切都将指向光明，而那光明并非遥不可及。举例/联想：Connected Sky，Does the color of the sky mean anything special to you?

desc.en: Just do it! Example: ystem All Green
desc.jp: Just do it! Example: ystem All Green
desc.zh_cn: 干就完了，奥利给！举例/联想：System All Green

name.en: Walking on the Beach with the Head Prefect
name.jp: Walking on the Beach with the Head Prefect

desc.en: Hina promises to see the ocean together, but collapses from exhaustion and is a no-show. Hina feels terrible and apologizes for ruining the meetup. Sensei shows Hina the beautiful view from the hotel.
desc.jp: Hina promises to see the ocean together, but collapses from exhaustion and is a no-show. Hina feels terrible and apologizes for ruining the meetup. Sensei shows Hina the beautiful view from the hotel.
desc.zh_cn: 约好要一起去海边玩的{cf阳奈}，却因为过劳而昏倒，然后错过了约定的时间。{cf阳奈}因为自己毁约而向老师道歉，老师则给她看从饭店房间里所看见的美丽风景。

desc.en: The 10th track in Blue Archive, used in relationship stories majorly.
desc.jp: The 10th track in Blue Archive, used in relationship stories majorly.

name.en: Doing Paperwork with the Head Prefect
name.jp: Doing Paperwork with the Head Prefect

desc.en: Hina wants to learn to swim, so Sensei rushes to help her. Unfortunately, their one-on-one swimming lesson takes an unexpected turn when Thugs run amok on the beach.
desc.jp: Hina wants to learn to swim, so Sensei rushes to help her. Unfortunately, their one-on-one swimming lesson takes an unexpected turn when Thugs run amok on the beach.
desc.zh_cn: {cf阳奈}说想要学游泳，因此老师匆匆忙忙跑去见她。不过，两人温馨的1:1游泳课却因为在海边引起骚动的混混们上演了意想不到的发展。

name.jp: Blue Archive Original Soundtrack (Vol.1 ~Longing for the memorable days~)
name.zh_cn: Blue Archive Original Soundtrack (Vol.1 ~Longing for the memorable days~)

desc.jp: Get ready for combat!Example: Encroached Sky、Polyphonic
desc.zh_cn: 全体就绪，准备战斗！举例/联想：Encroached Sky、Polyphonic

desc.jp: Example: FEEEEVER TIME, Undefined Behavior, Goal Wo Nerae! Overall it coincides with the Uplifting genre and combat tracks.
desc.zh_cn: 举例/联想：FEEEEVER TIME、Undefined Behavior、Goal Wo Nerae!；总体上基本与Uplifting的风格和战斗曲重合。

desc.en: Most battle tracks have this characteristic and are able to render such "atmosphere" (be noted that this tag emphasizes the "rendered atmosphere".) Example: Tech N Tech, NRG FielD (Mechanical Jungle doesn't belong to this tag.)
desc.jp: Most battle tracks have this characteristic and are able to render such "atmosphere" (be noted that this tag emphasizes the "rendered atmosphere".) Example: Tech N Tech, NRG FielD (Mechanical Jungle doesn't belong to this tag.)
desc.zh_cn: 通常战斗曲都带有这种风格并能够渲染出这种【氛围】（注意：这个标签只强调的是氛围感）。举例/联想：Tech N Tech、NRG FielD（Mechanical Jungle不属于这个标签）

name.en: Blue Archive Original Soundtrack (Vol.1 ~Longing for the memorable days~)
name.jp: Blue Archive Original Soundtrack (Vol.1 ~Longing for the memorable days~)
name.zh_cn: Blue Archive Original Soundtrack (Vol.1 ~Longing for the memorable days~)

profile.en:
Gehenna Academy head prefect visiting the beach for summer boot camp.

She may be aloof about most things, but was convinced to visit the beach for training. She's rarely been to the beach, so her swimsuit and floats are a little dated. She's slightly embarrassed they still fit her. Will not hesitate to enforce discipline even during the summer or against the raging sea.
profile.jp:
ゲヘナ学園所属、夏季合宿トレーニングのために海を訪れた風紀委員長。

基本的には面倒くさがり屋さんな彼女だが、訓練だから仕方がないと今回は海へ訪れた。海で遊んだことがほとんど無いという彼女は、水着も浮き輪も全て昔の物を持ってきた様子。その理由について「勿体ないから」とは言いつつも、その水着がまだ着られるという事実を心の底では微かに気にしている。しかしどんな格好であっても、そして季節が夏で、たとえ場所が海であっても、彼女が風紀に厳しいことに変わりはない。
profile.zh_cn_jp:
格黑娜学园所属，为了夏季合宿训练而来到了海边的「风纪委员会」委员长。

基本上觉得什么事都很麻烦的她，这次因为训练而无可奈何地到访海边。
几乎没怎么来过海边游玩的她，无论泳装还是泳圈都好像是以前的旧东西。
即使问起缘由时回答的是「不用太浪费了」，她心底里还是对自己还能穿上那件泳装的事实略微在意。
但无论穿着如何，以及即使在夏日的海边，她对纪律的严格也未曾改变。
profile.zh_cn_tw:
格黑娜学园所属，为了夏季合宿而来到海边的风纪委员长。

基本上怕麻烦的她，还是为了训练而无奈地来到海边。她几乎没有在海边玩耍过，泳衣和泳圈看起来都是以前的东西。即使说着「因为很浪费」这样的理由，却还是对自己仍能穿下那件泳衣而打心底感到有些在意。不过无论是什么样的打扮、季节或是地点，都无法改变她对风纪的严谨。
profile.zh_cn_cn:
为了夏季集训而来到海滩的歌赫娜风纪委员长。

虽然凡事都嫌麻烦，但为了这次训练，还是鼓足干劲来到了海滩。几乎没有去过大海，因此泳装和泳圈都是很久以前用过的。她对它们的尺寸至今依然合适这件事，悄悄地有些介意。除此之外，即便是夏日的海滩也丝毫没有影响到她维持纪律的决心。

gacha.en: My duties don't change simply because it is summertime.
gacha.jp: 夏だからって、別にやることは変わらない
gacha.zh_cn_jp: 到了夏天，该做的事也没有变
gacha.zh_cn_tw: 就算是夏天，要做的事也没有改变
gacha.zh_cn_cn: 虽然夏天到了，但该做的事情还是一样。

intro.en: Gehenna Head Prefect Hina reporting. I assure you this outfit is merely for summer training.
intro.jp:
ゲヘナの風紀委員長、ヒナ。
……これはあくまで、夏のトレーニング合宿のための格好だから。
intro.zh_cn_jp:
ゲヘナの風紀委員長、ヒナ。
……これはあくまで、夏のトレーニング合宿のための格好だから。
intro.zh_cn_tw:
格黑娜的风纪委员长，阳奈。
……这终究只是，为了夏天锻炼合宿的打扮。

name.en: Plans Are Destined to Go Awry
name.jp: Plans Are Destined to Go Awry

desc.en: Sensei assumes the role of keeping Hina distracted while Ako, Iori, and Chinatsu block the troublemakers. Sensei has to go and deal with the stronger-than-expected counterattack from the troublemakers when things get out of hand.
desc.jp: Sensei assumes the role of keeping Hina distracted while Ako, Iori, and Chinatsu block the troublemakers. Sensei has to go and deal with the stronger-than-expected counterattack from the troublemakers when things get out of hand.
desc.zh_cn: 在{cf亚子}、{cf伊织}与{cf千夏}领导的{cn风纪委员会}正在与问题儿童战斗时，老师拜访了{cf阳奈}。{cf亚子}本来是要老师将委员长留在房间里的，但战斗比想像中还要激烈，老师多次被呼唤。老师一边设法欺骗{cf阳奈}，一边反复指挥战斗。

一切都是为了完美的休假

desc.en: Sensei and the Prefect Team head to the ocean to give Hina a vacation! But the troubles keep mounting! Will Sensei and the Prefect Team be able to give Hina a proper summer vacation?
desc.jp: Sensei and the Prefect Team head to the ocean to give Hina a vacation! But the troubles keep mounting! Will Sensei and the Prefect Team be able to give Hina a proper summer vacation?
desc.zh_cn: 为了让{cf阳奈}能好好休个假，{cn风纪委员会}和老师一起来到了海边。但麻烦事却接二连三地发生，使得{cn风纪委员会}陷入一片慌乱……{cf阳奈}委员长的暑假，究竟会如何呢！？

desc.en: Sensei and the Prefect Team head to the ocean to give Hina a vacation! But the troubles keep mounting! Will Sensei and the Prefect Team be able to give Hina a proper summer vacation?
desc.jp: Sensei and the Prefect Team head to the ocean to give Hina a vacation! But the troubles keep mounting! Will Sensei and the Prefect Team be able to give Hina a proper summer vacation?
desc.zh_cn: 为了让{cf阳奈}能好好休个假，{cn风纪委员会}和老师一起来到了海边。但麻烦事却接二连三地发生，使得{cn风纪委员会}陷入一片慌乱……{cf阳奈}委员长的暑假，究竟会如何呢！？

name.zh_cn: 一切都是为了完美的休假

desc.en: Iori and Chinatsu believe that Hina must be informed of the current situation, but Ako strongly disagrees, claiming that it would ruin Hina's vacation. She says for Hina's sake, this situation should be resolved only among the Prefect Team and Sensei.
desc.jp: Iori and Chinatsu believe that Hina must be informed of the current situation, but Ako strongly disagrees, claiming that it would ruin Hina's vacation. She says for Hina's sake, this situation should be resolved only among the Prefect Team and Sensei.
desc.zh_cn: 预想可能会有比想像中还要大规模的全面战争，大家烦恼着是否该通知{cf阳奈}委员长，但{cf亚子}极力反对。鉴于目前的战斗力，认为他们应该能独自应付此情况，宣布继续作战。另一方面，{cf阳奈}说这是他第一次近距离看海，并将目光看向老师的方向……

hobby.jp: パトロール、大声を出すこと

realname.zh_cn: 不变的平凡 钢琴版

desc.zh_cn: 举例/联想：Usagi Flap、第114首曲子、第159首曲子

name.en: An Average Day at the Beach
name.jp: An Average Day at the Beach

desc.en: Thanks to everyone's cooperation, the Prefect Team successfully defeated the troublemakers in secret from Hina. However, their relief is short-lived, as new troublemakers soon appear.
desc.jp: Thanks to everyone's cooperation, the Prefect Team successfully defeated the troublemakers in secret from Hina. However, their relief is short-lived, as new troublemakers soon appear.
desc.zh_cn: 经历了一番苦战，老师和风纪委员们在不让{cf阳奈}发现的情况下，击退了头盔团和太妹。但这也只是短暂的放心，因为海边出现了新的问题儿童集团。

desc.en: The 7th track in Blue Archive, which is extremely popular and well-known due to the memes related to both the characters and stories.
desc.jp: The 7th track in Blue Archive, which is extremely popular and well-known due to the memes related to both the characters and stories.
desc.zh_cn: 蔚蓝档案OST中的第七首曲子，以其与人物及故事相关的梗和二创而相当热门和出名。

desc.en: Most battle tracks have this characteristic. The general representation includes fast drums and featuring multiple elements in a short period of time.
desc.jp: Most battle tracks have this characteristic. The general representation includes fast drums and featuring multiple elements in a short period of time.
desc.zh_cn: 大部分战斗曲均具备此特性，一般的表现形式为鼓点快、元素偏多的情况。

desc.en: Example: FEEEEVER TIME, Undefined Behavior, Goal Wo Nerae! Overall it coincides with the Uplifting genre and combat tracks.
desc.jp: Example: FEEEEVER TIME, Undefined Behavior, Goal Wo Nerae! Overall it coincides with the Uplifting genre and combat tracks.
desc.zh_cn: 举例/联想：FEEEEVER TIME、Undefined Behavior、Goal Wo Nerae!；总体上基本与Uplifting的风格和战斗曲重合。
举例/联想：Usagi Flap、第114首曲子、第159首曲子

desc.en: The 11th track in Blue Archive OST, usually plays at the "Recruitment" (Gacha) page.
desc.jp: The 11th track in Blue Archive OST, usually plays at the "Recruitment" (Gacha) page.
desc.zh_cn: 蔚蓝档案OST中的第十一首曲子，常在“招聘”（抽卡）页面播放。
等下，接下来要发生什么？！举例：第137首曲子

desc.en: Just do it! Example: ystem All Green
desc.jp: Just do it! Example: ystem All Green
desc.zh_cn: 干就完了，奥利给！举例/联想：System All Green

desc.en: Sensei and the Prefect Team head to the ocean to give Hina a vacation! But the troubles keep mounting! Will Sensei and the Prefect Team be able to give Hina a proper summer vacation?
desc.jp: Sensei and the Prefect Team head to the ocean to give Hina a vacation! But the troubles keep mounting! Will Sensei and the Prefect Team be able to give Hina a proper summer vacation?
desc.zh_cn: 为了让{cf阳奈}能好好休个假，{cn风纪委员会}和老师一起来到了海边。但麻烦事却接二连三地发生，使得{cn风纪委员会}陷入一片慌乱……{cf阳奈}委员长的暑假，究竟会如何呢！？

desc.en: Night comes shortly after the commotion of the day. Sensei and Hina walk on the beach, and Sensei promises to teach her how to swim.
desc.jp: Night comes shortly after the commotion of the day. Sensei and Hina walk on the beach, and Sensei promises to teach her how to swim.
desc.zh_cn: 平息各种骚动后，老师和{cf阳奈}沿着夜晚的海滩散步。{cf阳奈}似乎已经注意到，老师为了{cn风纪委员会}在暗中四处奔走……

hobby.jp: パトロール、大声を出すこと

realname.zh_cn: 不变的平凡 钢琴版

desc.en: The 10th track in Blue Archive, used in relationship stories majorly.
desc.jp: The 10th track in Blue Archive, used in relationship stories majorly.
desc.zh_cn: 蔚蓝档案OST中的第十首曲子，主要用于羁绊故事中。

desc.en: In Kivotos, no future is dark; even so, it was temporary, as it will point to the bright ending that is possible to reach. Example: Connected Sky, Does the color of the sky mean anything special to you?
desc.jp: In Kivotos, no future is dark; even so, it was temporary, as it will point to the bright ending that is possible to reach. Example: Connected Sky, Does the color of the sky mean anything special to you?
desc.zh_cn: 在基沃托斯，没有任何一个未来是黑暗的；即使有，那也只是暂时的，因为最终这一切都将指向光明，而那光明并非遥不可及。举例/联想：Connected Sky，Does the color of the sky mean anything special to you?

desc.en: Just do it! Example: ystem All Green
desc.jp: Just do it! Example: ystem All Green
desc.zh_cn: 干就完了，奥利给！举例/联想：System All Green

desc.jp: Sensei and the Prefect Team head to the ocean to give Hina a vacation! But the troubles keep mounting! Will Sensei and the Prefect Team be able to give Hina a proper summer vacation?
desc.zh_cn: 为了让{cf阳奈}能好好休个假，{cn风纪委员会}和老师一起来到了海边。但麻烦事却接二连三地发生，使得{cn风纪委员会}陷入一片慌乱……{cf阳奈}委员长的暑假，究竟会如何呢！？

desc.en: Just when Hina's vacation is back on track, countless troublemakers begin to assemble. Hina appears just as Ako is overwhelmed and at a loss.
desc.jp: Just when Hina's vacation is back on track, countless troublemakers begin to assemble. Hina appears just as Ako is overwhelmed and at a loss.
desc.zh_cn: 尽管{cn风纪委员会}竭尽全力让{cf阳奈}委员长有学习游泳的时间，但头盔团、{cn美食研究会}，甚至是{cn温泉开发部}都趁着风纪委员长不在的空档，将海边彻底变成了战场。就在{cf亚子}留着泪，准备放弃的时候，不知从哪里传来了{cf阳奈}的声音。

desc.jp: Most battle tracks have this characteristic and are able to render such "atmosphere" (be noted that this tag emphasizes the "rendered atmosphere".) Example: Tech N Tech, NRG FielD (Mechanical Jungle doesn't belong to this tag.)

desc.en: The troublemakers are easily defeated with Hina joining the fight. Having resolved the problem so quickly, Hina looks back at the Prefect team and calls for a reflection meeting.
desc.jp: The troublemakers are easily defeated with Hina joining the fight. Having resolved the problem so quickly, Hina looks back at the Prefect team and calls for a reflection meeting.
desc.zh_cn: 面对{cf阳奈}压倒性的力量，问题儿童纷纷撤退。他回头看向风纪委员们，表示「一回到饭店就马上召开反省会」。

desc.en: Sensei and the Prefect Team head to the ocean to give Hina a vacation! But the troubles keep mounting! Will Sensei and the Prefect Team be able to give Hina a proper summer vacation?
desc.jp: Sensei and the Prefect Team head to the ocean to give Hina a vacation! But the troubles keep mounting! Will Sensei and the Prefect Team be able to give Hina a proper summer vacation?
desc.zh_cn: 为了让{cf阳奈}能好好休个假，{cn风纪委员会}和老师一起来到了海边。但麻烦事却接二连三地发生，使得{cn风纪委员会}陷入一片慌乱……{cf阳奈}委员长的暑假，究竟会如何呢！？

desc.en: Sensei and the Prefect Team head to the ocean to give Hina a vacation! But the troubles keep mounting! Will Sensei and the Prefect Team be able to give Hina a proper summer vacation?
desc.jp: Sensei and the Prefect Team head to the ocean to give Hina a vacation! But the troubles keep mounting! Will Sensei and the Prefect Team be able to give Hina a proper summer vacation?
desc.zh_cn: 为了让{cf阳奈}能好好休个假，{cn风纪委员会}和老师一起来到了海边。但麻烦事却接二连三地发生，使得{cn风纪委员会}陷入一片慌乱……{cf阳奈}委员长的暑假，究竟会如何呢！？

desc.en: Hina lets out a sigh at Ako's excuse that she was looking out for her. Hina then smiles as she declares that the summer boot camp isn't over yet, and that the real grueling training has only begun.
desc.jp: Hina lets out a sigh at Ako's excuse that she was looking out for her. Hina then smiles as she declares that the summer boot camp isn't over yet, and that the real grueling training has only begun.
desc.zh_cn: 听完{cf亚子}的一番说明后，{cf阳奈}叹了口气。虽然他觉得能好好休息也不错，但也同时宣布「集训从现在起重新开始」。当风纪委员们陷入绝望时，{cf阳奈}在老师的耳边低声说道「之后要补偿唷」并静静微笑着。

hobby.jp: パトロール、大声を出すこと

desc.en: Get ready for combat!Example: Encroached Sky、Polyphonic
desc.jp: Get ready for combat!Example: Encroached Sky、Polyphonic
desc.zh_cn: 全体就绪，准备战斗！举例/联想：Encroached Sky、Polyphonic

desc.en: Example: FEEEEVER TIME, Undefined Behavior, Goal Wo Nerae! Overall it coincides with the Uplifting genre and combat tracks.
desc.jp: Example: FEEEEVER TIME, Undefined Behavior, Goal Wo Nerae! Overall it coincides with the Uplifting genre and combat tracks.
desc.zh_cn: 举例/联想：FEEEEVER TIME、Undefined Behavior、Goal Wo Nerae!；总体上基本与Uplifting的风格和战斗曲重合。

desc.en: The 10th track in Blue Archive, used in relationship stories majorly.
desc.jp: The 10th track in Blue Archive, used in relationship stories majorly.
desc.zh_cn: 蔚蓝档案OST中的第十首曲子，主要用于羁绊故事中。

desc.en: In Kivotos, no future is dark; even so, it was temporary, as it will point to the bright ending that is possible to reach. Example: Connected Sky, Does the color of the sky mean anything special to you?
desc.jp: In Kivotos, no future is dark; even so, it was temporary, as it will point to the bright ending that is possible to reach. Example: Connected Sky, Does the color of the sky mean anything special to you?
desc.zh_cn: 在基沃托斯，没有任何一个未来是黑暗的；即使有，那也只是暂时的，因为最终这一切都将指向光明，而那光明并非遥不可及。举例/联想：Connected Sky，Does the color of the sky mean anything special to you?

desc.en: Just do it! Example: ystem All Green
desc.jp: Just do it! Example: ystem All Green
desc.zh_cn: 干就完了，奥利给！举例/联想：System All Green

realname.zh_cn: 不变的平凡 钢琴版

desc.en: Example: FEEEEVER TIME, Undefined Behavior, Goal Wo Nerae! Overall it coincides with the Uplifting genre and combat tracks.
desc.jp: Example: FEEEEVER TIME, Undefined Behavior, Goal Wo Nerae! Overall it coincides with the Uplifting genre and combat tracks.
desc.zh_cn: 举例/联想：FEEEEVER TIME、Undefined Behavior、Goal Wo Nerae!；总体上基本与Uplifting的风格和战斗曲重合。
举例/联想：Usagi Flap、第114首曲子、第159首曲子

desc.en: The 7th track in Blue Archive, which is extremely popular and well-known due to the memes related to both the characters and stories.
desc.jp: The 7th track in Blue Archive, which is extremely popular and well-known due to the memes related to both the characters and stories.
desc.zh_cn: 蔚蓝档案OST中的第七首曲子，以其与人物及故事相关的梗和二创而相当热门和出名。

desc.en: Most battle tracks have this characteristic. The general representation includes fast drums and featuring multiple elements in a short period of time.
desc.jp: Most battle tracks have this characteristic. The general representation includes fast drums and featuring multiple elements in a short period of time.
desc.zh_cn: 大部分战斗曲均具备此特性，一般的表现形式为鼓点快、元素偏多的情况。
